<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_ui_policy"><catalog_ui_policy action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><catalog_conditions>IO:a00a1cf92f43b010dfa35e072799b6d2ISNOTEMPTY^EQ</catalog_conditions><catalog_item display_value="Request Travel">a00a1cf92f43b010dfa35e072799b6cd</catalog_item><conditions/><description/><global>true</global><inherit>false</inherit><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><model_id/><model_table/><on_load>true</on_load><order>100</order><reverse_if_false>true</reverse_if_false><run_scripts>true</run_scripts><script_false><![CDATA[function onCondition() {

}]]></script_false><script_true><![CDATA[function onCondition() {

	if (g_form.getBooleanValue('destination.banned')) {
		g_form.setVisible('justification');
		g_form.setMandatory('justification');
	}
}]]></script_true><set_values/><short_description>If Country is Banned, must provide Justification</short_description><sys_class_name>catalog_ui_policy</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>kennedy.hall</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-10-07 15:03:18</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c50a943d2f43b010dfa35e072799b66a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>If Country is Banned, must provide Justification</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="International Travel" source="x_684922_int_trav">fd7e917f2f323010dfa35e072799b6d1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="International Travel">fd7e917f2f323010dfa35e072799b6d1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_ui_policy_c50a943d2f43b010dfa35e072799b66a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kennedy.hall</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-10-07 15:03:18</sys_updated_on><table/><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_ui_policy></record_update>
